name: PowerSimulator
description:
In 《Promotion Simulator》, you will play a common person without a background who steps into the officialdom step by step. Simply click, wave, and swipe your finger to handle various demands from your colleagues, superiors, and people. With your strong decision-making power and intelligence, you will wander through the officialdom and ascend to a higher position. Every decision you make may have a corresponding impact, and if you take the wrong step, you may fall into an abyss of irreparable harm. Whether they are good or bad, please choose carefully.



Promotion to a higher official position: With your strong decision-making power and intelligence, you can wander through the officialdom, advance to a higher official position, and then share it with your friends.

Prudent decision-making: Every choice you make will have an impact on four dimensions: political performance, wealth, interpersonal relationships, and public opinion. Once one of these options loses control, you will suffer catastrophic consequences.

Rich and diverse achievements: Unlock various rare and little-known achievements and share them with your friends.
